'''Sara's Letter''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Pigeons Go AWOL}}. The letter can only be given by [[Draff]] if the player kill the pigeons.

==Description==
"...We have received your letter and are preparing your order. However, since [[Mondstadt]] is a long way from Liyue Harbor, we must still make some final preparations to ensure the food stays fresh en route. Thank you for your patience."<br>
"P.S. The Spicy Dried Fish can be adjusted to your own taste."
